function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Bluetooth technology operates at 2.4 GHz frequency, making it more prone to hackers and privacy interference.","Impact":"Privacy interference and potential hacking of personal data.","Mitigation":"Secure pairing with a password key, using Bluetooth's pairing models.","Technologies":"Secure pairing using Bluetooth's pairing models.","People":"Users of Bluetooth-enabled devices.","Owner":"Individuals and organizations developing Bluetooth technology and protocols."},{"Description":"Use of Bluetooth for contact tracing may raise privacy concerns and risks related to the misuse of personal data.","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and unauthorized access to personal information.","Mitigation":"Implementing robust privacy protection measures, user consent for data collection, and strict data access controls.","Technologies":"Privacy protection measures, user consent mechanisms, and data access controls.","People":"Individuals who are subject to contact tracing, public health authorities implementing contact tracing.","Owner":"Public health authorities, developers of contact tracing apps and protocols."}]}
